authentication.notes: FREE account registration provides access to public bug bounty programs, vulnerability submission, and learning resources.

description: HackerOne bug bounty platform - FREE public program participation, vulnerability disclosure, and security learning resources.

bash.hackerone_check:
#!/bin/bash
# HackerOne Quick Reference - FREE!

echo "🎯 HackerOne Free Resources (COMPLETELY FREE!)"
echo "============================================"
echo ""

echo "📚 Free Learning Resources:"
echo "   • Hacker101: https://www.hacker101.com/"
echo "   • CTF Platform: https://ctf.hacker101.com/"
echo "   • Video Lessons: Free security training"
echo "   • Playground: Practice environments"
echo ""

echo "🏢 Public Programs:"
echo "   • Directory: https://hackerone.com/directory"
echo "   • 3000+ programs available"
echo "   • No cost to participate"
echo "   • Earn real bounties"
echo ""

echo "📰 Hacktivity Feed:"
echo "   • URL: https://hackerone.com/hacktivity"
echo "   • Real disclosed vulnerabilities"
echo "   • Learn from others' reports"
echo "   • See bounty amounts"
echo ""

echo "💰 Earning Potential:"
echo "   • Critical: $2,500-$10,000+"
echo "   • High: $1,000-$5,000"
echo "   • Medium: $250-$1,500"
echo "   • Low: $50-$500"
echo ""

echo "🆓 All FREE with registration!"

curl.get_programs:
# Browse public programs - FREE!
curl -s 'https://hackerone.com/directory' | grep -E 'program-name' | head -10

python.hackerone_client:
import requests
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

class HackerOnePublic:
    """HackerOne Public Resources Client - FREE ACCESS!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://hackerone.com'
        self.api_url = 'https://api.hackerone.com/v1'
        
    def get_public_programs(self):
        """List public bug bounty programs (FREE!)"""
        print("🎯 HackerOne Public Programs (FREE!)\n")
        
        # Simulated program data (actual requires web scraping)
        programs = [
            {
                'name': 'GitHub',
                'min_bounty': 100,
                'max_bounty': 30000,
                'reports_resolved': 1500,
                'response_time': '< 24 hours'
            },
            {
                'name': 'PayPal',
                'min_bounty': 50,
                'max_bounty': 15000,
                'reports_resolved': 2000,
                'response_time': '< 48 hours'
            },
            {
                'name': 'Spotify',
                'min_bounty': 100,
                'max_bounty': 20000,
                'reports_resolved': 800,
                'response_time': '< 72 hours'
            },
            {
                'name': 'Twitter',
                'min_bounty': 140,
                'max_bounty': 15080,
                'reports_resolved': 1200,
                'response_time': '< 24 hours'
            }
        ]
        
        print("📊 Popular Public Programs:\n")
        for program in programs:
            print(f"   🏢 {program['name']}")
            print(f"      Bounty Range: ${program['min_bounty']} - ${program['max_bounty']}")
            print(f"      Reports Resolved: {program['reports_resolved']}+")
            print(f"      Response Time: {program['response_time']}")
            print()
        
        print("🔗 Browse all programs: https://hackerone.com/directory\n")
        return programs
    
    def get_hacktivity_feed(self):
        """Get recent disclosed vulnerabilities (FREE!)"""
        print("📰 HackerOne Hacktivity Feed (FREE!)\n")
        
        # Example hacktivity items
        hacktivity = [
            {
                'title': 'XSS in profile page',
                'program': 'Example Corp',
                'severity': 'Medium',
                'bounty': 500,
                'reporter': 'security_researcher_1'
            },
            {
                'title': 'SQL Injection in API',
                'program': 'Tech Company',
                'severity': 'Critical',
                'bounty': 5000,
                'reporter': 'bug_hunter_pro'
            },
            {
                'title': 'IDOR vulnerability',
                'program': 'E-commerce Site',
                'severity': 'High',
                'bounty': 2000,
                'reporter': 'ethical_hacker'
            }
        ]
        
        print("🔓 Recent Disclosed Vulnerabilities:\n")
        for activity in hacktivity:
            severity_emoji = {
                'Critical': '🔴',
                'High': '🟠',
                'Medium': '🟡',
                'Low': '🟢'
            }
            
            print(f"   {severity_emoji.get(activity['severity'], '⚪')} {activity['title']}")
            print(f"      Program: {activity['program']}")
            print(f"      Severity: {activity['severity']}")
            print(f"      Bounty: ${activity['bounty']}")
            print(f"      Reporter: @{activity['reporter']}")
            print()
        
        print("📈 View full Hacktivity: https://hackerone.com/hacktivity\n")
        return hacktivity
    
    def hacker101_resources(self):
        """Get Hacker101 free training resources (FREE!)"""
        print("🎓 Hacker101 Free Training (COMPLETELY FREE!)\n")
        
        courses = {
            'Beginner': [
                'Introduction to Web Hacking',
                'HTTP Basics',
                'Cookie Security',
                'HTML Injection',
                'Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)'
            ],
            'Intermediate': [
                'SQL Injection',
                'Command Injection',
                'Directory Traversal',
                'Session Fixation',
                'Clickjacking'
            ],
            'Advanced': [
                'XML External Entity (XXE)',
                'Server Side Request Forgery',
                'Crypto Attacks',
                'Race Conditions',
                'Advanced XSS'
            ]
        }
        
        print("📚 Free Course Categories:\n")
        for level, topics in courses.items():
            print(f"   📖 {level} Level:")
            for topic in topics:
                print(f"      • {topic}")
            print()
        
        print("🏁 CTF Challenges:\n")
        print("   • Micro-CMS v1")
        print("   • Micro-CMS v2")
        print("   • Photo Gallery")
        print("   • Cody's First Blog")
        print("   • Postbook")
        print("   • And many more!\n")
        
        print("🔗 Start learning: https://www.hacker101.com/")
        print("🎮 CTF Platform: https://ctf.hacker101.com/\n")
        
        return courses
    
    def vulnerability_disclosure_guide(self):
        """Guide for responsible disclosure (FREE!)"""
        print("🛡️ Vulnerability Disclosure Guide (FREE!)\n")
        
        print("📋 Disclosure Process:\n")
        steps = [
            "Find a vulnerability in scope",
            "Write clear, detailed report",
            "Include proof of concept",
            "Submit through HackerOne",
            "Wait for triage",
            "Collaborate on fix",
            "Get bounty/recognition",
            "Report gets disclosed (optional)"
        ]
        
        for i, step in enumerate(steps, 1):
            print(f"   {i}. {step}")
        
        print("\n💰 Bounty Ranges by Severity:\n")
        severities = {
            'Critical': '$2,500 - $10,000+',
            'High': '$1,000 - $5,000',
            'Medium': '$250 - $1,500',
            'Low': '$50 - $500'
        }
        
        for severity, range_val in severities.items():
            print(f"   • {severity}: {range_val}")
        
        print("\n🏆 Reputation Benefits:\n")
        benefits = [
            "Build security reputation",
            "Earn recognition points",
            "Get invited to private programs",
            "Receive swag and rewards",
            "Network with security community",
            "Potential job opportunities"
        ]
        
        for benefit in benefits:
            print(f"   • {benefit}")
        
        print("\n🔗 Start reporting: https://hackerone.com/directory\n")
        
    def platform_statistics(self):
        """HackerOne platform statistics (FREE!)"""
        print("📊 HackerOne Platform Statistics (FREE!)\n")
        
        stats = {
            'Total Bounties Paid': '$300M+',
            'Vulnerabilities Found': '300,000+',
            'Registered Hackers': '1,000,000+',
            'Customer Programs': '3,000+',
            'Countries Represented': '170+',
            'Average Time to Fix': '30 days'
        }
        
        print("🌍 Global Impact:\n")
        for metric, value in stats.items():
            print(f"   • {metric}: {value}")
        
        print("\n🎯 Program Types (All FREE to join!):\n")
        program_types = [
            "Bug Bounty Programs",
            "Vulnerability Disclosure Programs (VDP)",
            "Pentest Programs",
            "Government Programs",
            "Open Source Programs"
        ]
        
        for ptype in program_types:
            print(f"   • {ptype}")
        
        print("\n🆓 Free Features:\n")
        free_features = [
            "Join all public programs",
            "Submit unlimited reports",
            "Access Hacker101 training",
            "Play CTF challenges",
            "View Hacktivity feed",
            "Build reputation",
            "Earn bounties",
            "Get swag rewards"
        ]
        
        for feature in free_features:
            print(f"   ✅ {feature}")
        
        return stats

# Usage
client = HackerOnePublic()
client.get_public_programs()
client.get_hacktivity_feed()
client.hacker101_resources()
client.vulnerability_disclosure_guide()
client.platform_statistics()
